item.title: Improving the detection of technical debt in Java source code with an enriched dataset
item.description: Enriched dataset TESORO improves technical debt detection by combining self-admitted comments and Java source code, advancing state-of-the-art models.

item.title: SambaMixer: State of Health Prediction of Li-ion Batteries using Mamba State Space Models
item.description: SambaMixer: A novel state-space model accurately predicts Li-ion battery health using efficient Mamba architecture and innovative resampling techniques.
